Package natlang.rdg.model

Interface Summary
RSVertex RSVertex models a structure in a Rhetorical Dependency Structure.
 

Class Summary
CannedText Represents a sentence stored as canned text (can be a leaf node)
Detail A detail about a certain element in a plot element
MOrderedEdge This class models the edges in an ordered Dependency Tree.
OrderedDepTreeModel This class models a dependency tree which branches are ordered, so that it can be easily made into the surface form
PlotElement This class represents a plot element taken from the input.
RhetRelation RhetRelation is a MLabeledVertex; it has in- and outgoing edges which connect it to RSDepTreeModels and other RhetRelations.
RSDepTreeModel RDepTreeModel models a Dependency Tree as used in a rhetorical dependency structure (based on Alpino dependency trees).
RSDepTreeNode This class represents a node in a dependency tree of the type used in a rhetorical dependency graph (based on the dependency trees used by Alpino).
RSEdge RSEdge models the edges in a Rhetorical Dependency Structure.
RSGraph RSGraph is a MGraph which models a rhetorical dependency structure, constructing it out of a xml-document.
RSTreeNodeData RSTreeNodeData holds the data of a treenode in a RS Dependency tree, e.g.
Rule This class models a grammatical rule
